story.book

Class RequestTextDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • DialogFragment
      • story.book.RequestTextDialog

  • public class RequestTextDialog
extends DialogFragment
    RequestTextDialog is a DialogFragment to get some text and return it to its calling activity. The calling activity must implement the RequstingActivity interface.
    Author:
    Vina Nguyen
    See Also:
    RequestingActivity
